member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.AsymmetricCrypto
member.summary: This is common class for Asymmetric Cryptography operations. You can use this class to perform dependency injection.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.AsymmetricCrypto.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor assigns RsaCrypto class to perform Asymmetric Cryptography operations.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.AsymmetricCrypto.#ctor(MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.IAsymmetricCrypto)
member.summary: Injectable constructor that can use your own IAsymmetricCryptography implementation.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.AsymmetricCrypto.GenerateKeys(System.Int32)
member.summary: To encrypt/decrypt data, it must be called first to generate both keys and used to perform the operations.
member.returns: SessionsKeys. Returns null if GenerateKeys fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.AsymmetricCrypto.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts the data using public key generated by GenerateKeys() method.
member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.AsymmetricCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts the data using private key generated by GenerateKeys() method. PrivateKey must be generated along with PublicKey.
member.returns: Decrypted data in xml format.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACrypto
member.summary: This class performs Encryption and Decryption using RSA Algorithm.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACrypto.GenerateKeys(System.Int32)
member.summary: To encrypt/decrypt data, it must be called first to generate both keys and used to perform the operations.
member.param: Rsa Legal Key Size (384-16384 with skipSize=8).
member.returns: SessionsKeys. Returns null if GenerateKeys fails.
member.exception: 'keySize' must be in range of 384-16384 with skipSize=8

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACrypto.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts the data using public key generated by GenerateKeys() method.
member.param: Rsa Legal Key Size (384-16384 with skipSize=8).
member.returns: Encrypted data.
member.exception: 'keySize' must be in range of 384-16384 with skipSize=8

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts the data using private key generated by GenerateKeys() method. PrivateKey must be generated along with PublicKey.
member.param: Rsa Legal Key Size (384-16384 with skipSize=8).
member.returns: Decrypted data.
member.exception: 'keySize' must be in range of 384-16384 with skipSize=8

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACrypto.GetValidKeySizes
member.summary: Gets valid RSA key sizes.
member.returns: Valid RSA key sizes in array of integer type.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACryptoMachineKeyStore
member.summary: Encrypts/Decrypts data using CSP with Microsoft Strong Cryptographic Provider.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACryptoMachineKeyStore.ClearKeysFromContainer
member.summary: Clears keys from container.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACryptoMachineKeyStore.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts data using Microsoft Strong Cryptographic Provider and stores keys to container. It will store keys to computer's key store. It Uses UseMachineKeyStore flag for CspParameters.
member.param: Rsa Legal Key Size (384-16384 with skipSize=8).
member.returns: Encrypted data.
member.exception: 'keySize' must be in range of 384-16384 with skipSize=8

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACryptoMachineKeyStore.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts data using Microsoft Strong Cryptographic Provider and stores keys to container. It will store keys to computer's key store. It Uses UseMachineKeyStore flag for CspParameters.
member.param: Rsa Legal Key Size (384-16384 with skipSize=8).
member.returns: Decrypted data.
member.exception: 'keySize' must be in range of 384-16384 with skipSize=8

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.RSACryptoMachineKeyStore.GetValidKeySizes
member.summary: Gets valid RSA key sizes.
member.returns: Valid RSA key sizes in array of integer type.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.SessionKeys
member.summary: This class holds public and private keys in xml to perform asymmetric encryption.

member.name: P:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.SessionKeys.PublicKeyXml
member.summary: Gets/Sets public key to encrypt the data.

member.name: P:MirzaCryptoHelpers.AsymmetricCryptos.SessionKeys.PrivateKeyXml
member.summary: Gets/Sets private key to decrypt the data.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitComparer
member.summary: Class that performs comparison between 2 data.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitComparer.CompareBytes(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compares 2 data in bytes and returns true if both are same, otherwise false.
member.returns: Returs true if both are same, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitComparer.CompareHashes(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compares 2 data using SHA-256 algorithm.
member.returns: Returs true if both are same, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitComparer.CompareHashes(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],MirzaCryptoHelpers.Hashings.IHashCrypto)
member.summary: Compares 2 data using algorithm that implements IHashCrypto interface.
member.param: Hash algorithm that implements IHashCrypto interface.
member.returns: Returs true if both are same, otherwise false.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers
member.summary: Static class that provides basic helpers to support cryptographic operations.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.GenerateRandomNumbers(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates random numbers.
member.returns: Random numbers.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertStringToBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Converts given string to UTF-8 bytes.
member.returns: UTF-8 bytes.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertBytesToString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts bytes data to UTF-8 string.
member.returns: UTF-8 string.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToBase64String(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts bytes data to Base64 encoded string.
member.returns: Base64 encoded string.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromBase64String(System.String)
member.summary: Converts Base64 encoded string to bytes.
member.returns: Data in bytes. Returns null if operation fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.CreateSecurePassword(System.String,MirzaCryptoHelpers.Hashings.IHashCrypto,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates secure password based on the predefined input. Hash algorithm must implement IHash interface and choosen algorithm will determine the size of password returned.
member.param: Input as string. It's called predefined input.
Concrete hash algorithm that implements IHash interface.
member.returns: Random password in bytes.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.CreateSecurePassword(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates secure password based on the predefined input. Size of bytes determines the size of returned password. Iteration determines how many iterations to take to produce final result.
member.param: Input as string. It's called predefined input.
Size of returned password in bytes.
member.returns: Random password in bytes.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToBinary(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string input to binary.
member.returns: Binary string.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToBinary(System.Char)
member.summary: Converts char to binary.
member.returns: Binary string. Returns Empty string if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToBinary(System.Int16)
member.summary: Converts Int16 input to binary
member.returns: Binary string. Returns Empty string if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToBinary(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts Int32 input to binary
member.returns: Binary string. Returns Empty string if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToBinary(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts Int64 input to binary.
member.returns: Binary string. Returns Empty string if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromBinary(System.String,System.Int64[]@)
member.summary: Converts from binary to array of Int64. Each binary converted value will be stored in 'result' index.
member.param: Binary data in string format. Ex: 0011 0011.
Array of Int64. It'll be empty if conversion fails.
member.returns: True if conversion succeeds. Else returns false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromBinary(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Converts from binary string to normal string.
member.param: Binary data in string format. Ex: 0011 0011. Returns null if fails.
Normal string as a result of conversion.
member.returns: True if conversion succeeds. Else returns false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToOctal(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string input to octal.
member.returns: Octal string. Returns empty string if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToOctal(System.Char)
member.summary: Converts char input to octal.
member.returns: Octal string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToOctal(System.Int16)
member.summary: Converts Int16 input to octal.
member.returns: Octal in string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToOctal(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts Int32 input to octal.
member.returns: Octal string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToOctal(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts Int64 to octal.
member.returns: Octal string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromOctal(System.String,System.Int64[]@)
member.summary: Converts from octal to array of Int64. Each octal converted value will be stored in 'result' index.
member.param: Octal data in string format. Ex: 435 014 555.
Array of Int64. It'll be empty if conversion fails.
member.returns: True if conversion succeeds. Else returns false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromOctal(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Converts from octal string to normal string.
member.param: Octal data in string format. Ex: 435 014 555. Returns null if fails.
Normal string as a result of conversion.
member.returns: True if conversion succeeds. Else returns false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToHexadecimal(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string input to hexadecimal.
member.returns: Hexadecimal string. Returns empty string if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToHexadecimal(System.Char)
member.summary: Converts char input to hexadecimal.
member.returns: Hexadecimal string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToHexadecimal(System.Int16)
member.summary: Converts Int16 input to hexadecimal.
member.returns: Hexadecimal in string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToHexadecimal(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts Int32 input to hexadecimal.
member.returns: Hexadecimal string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertToHexadecimal(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts Int64 to hexadecimal.
member.returns: Hexadecimal string. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromHexadecimal(System.String,System.Int64[]@)
member.summary: Converts from hexadecimal to array of Int64. Each hexadecimal converted value will be stored in 'result' index.
member.param: Hexadecimal data in string format. Ex: 435 014 555.
Array of Int64. It'll be empty if conversion fails.
member.returns: True if conversion succeeds. Else returns false.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Common.BitHelpers.ConvertFromHexadecimal(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Converts from hexadecimal string to normal string.
member.param: Hexadecimal data in string format. Ex: 1C7A B363 87CD. Returns null if fails.
Normal string as a result of conversion.
member.returns: True if conversion succeeds. Else returns false.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.DigitalSignatures.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: Hash algorithm to use for digital signature operations.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.DigitalSignatures.RSADataSignature
member.summary: Helper class to perform signing and verifying data using RSA Crypto Algorithm.

member.summary: Creates digital signature.

member.returns: Signed data in bytes. Returns null if fails.

member.summary: Verifies digital signature.
member.param: Public key in xml format to verify the data.
member.returns: Boolean value indicating wheter data is valid or not.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Hashings.HashCrypto.GetHashBase64String(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Hashes data and converts it to Base64 encoded string.
member.returns: Hash data in Base64 encoded string format.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Hashings.HashCrypto.GetHashBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Hashes string data to hash bytes.
member.returns: Hash data in bytes. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.Hashings.HashCrypto.GetHashBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Hashes bytes data to hash bytes.
member.returns: Hash data in bytes. Returns empty if fails.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto
member.summary: This class simplifies symmetric cryptography operations using AES.

member.name: P:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto.ValidIVSize
member.summary: Gets valid IV size.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.
member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes. Returns null if encryption fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using self-generated IV.
member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes. Returns null if encryption fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using dynamic IV.
member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes. Returns null if encryption fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.
member.returns: Decrypted data in bytes. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.AESCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using dynamic IV.
member.returns: Decrypted data in bytes. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.summary: Gets valid IV size.

member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.

member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using self-generated IV.

member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using dynamic IV.
member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes. Returns null if encryption fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.DESCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.
member.returns: Decrypted data in bytes. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.DESCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using dynamic IV.
member.returns: Decrypted data in bytes. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto
member.summary: General Symmetric Cryptography class that can be used by any class which implements ISymmetricCrypto interface. This class can be used for dependency injection.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto.#ctor
member.summary: Main constructor that initializes encryption algorithm using AES

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto.#ctor(MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.ISymmetricCrypto)
member.summary: Secondary constructor that accepts class that implements ISymmetricCrypto interface.
member.param: Any class that implements ISymmetricCrypto interface. If null, an instance of AESCrypto will be used.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.
member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes. Returns null if encryption fails.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.
member.returns: Decrypted data in bytes. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts data in string format with password using static IV. It will return cipher text in Base64 string format.
member.param: Plain text or data to encrypt.
member.returns: Cipher text in Base64 string format. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.SymmetricCrypto.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts data from Base64 string cipher text to plain text using static IV. NOTE: If cipher text is not in valid Base64 string format, InvalidOperationException will be thrown.
member.param: Cipher text in Base64 string format.
member.returns: Plain text. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: T:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.TripleDESCrypto
member.summary: This class simplifies symmetric cryptography operations using Triple DES.

member.name: P:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.TripleDESCrypto.ValidIVSize
member.summary: Gets valid IV size.

member.returns: Encrypted data in bytes. Returns null if encryption fails.

member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using self-generated IV.

member.summary: Encrypts bytes of data with password using dynamic IV.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.TripleDESCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using static IV.
member.returns: Decrypted data in bytes. Returns null either decryption fails or password is incorrect.

member.name: M:MirzaCryptoHelpers.SymmetricCryptos.TripleDESCrypto.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts bytes of data with password using dynamic IV.
